# CSM

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of CSM is to provide the user with tools to analyze tissue data with spatial context.

## Installation

You can install the development version of CSM from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("Alvaro-LJ/CSM")
```
